transcript.text: Which of these scenarios do you think could be problematic?

contentText.text: Do you think these examples could be perceived as bribery?

instructionText.text: Select all the problematic scenarios and then click on Submit.
Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.

extraInstructionText.text: There may be more than one correct answer.

optionContent.option: You promise a client a cash gift in exchange for a favorable business decision
A subcontractor who wants your business invites you to several dinners and sports events
You make a campaign contribution to a government official who is a potential client
Your manager hires a client’s daughter in exchange for the client agreeing to extend his current contract

correct.text: In fact, all of these scenarios could be considered bribes depending on the circumstances. The intent to influence is a major factor but it is also important to remember that even the appearance of a bribe could be problematic for you and Johnson Controls, so think before you act!
